description:
This is a Kafka connector for subscribing to Apache Kafka topics, receiving messages from the topics, and loading the messages into MarkLogic.
It is built off of the Kafka Connect framework, and therefore automatically supports pluggable encoding converters, single message transforms, and other useful features.
MarkLogic 9+ is required.
name: kafka-marklogic-connector

support.summary: For technical support information, please see https://docs.marklogic.com/11.0/guide/release-notes/en/technical-support.html and http://help.marklogic.com.
